function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Complex relationship between social and meteorological factors in coronavirus outbreaks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limitations in the identification of confounding factors impacting the final analysis of included articles","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of secondary data due to the urgency of the global situation with the rapid spread of covid-19","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Extrapolation of results from studies conducted before the outbreak to the spread characteristics of covid-19 worldwide","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Methodological issues identified in the systematic review.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High risk of bias in two studies investigating the effect of humidity on the transmission of sars-cov-2.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Moderate and low risk of bias in certain studies investigating the effect of humidity on the transmission of sars-cov-2.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low certainty of evidence in studies on the association between temperature and humidity with the spread rate of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Observational studies with inherent risk of bias in the assessment of climate variables","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Homogeneity of results among the included studies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unreviewed articles","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Confounding variables impact on disease spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of bias in included studies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Homogeneity in the effect of temperature and humidity on the seasonal variability and spread of the virus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate statistical analysis compromising conclusions about the effect of temperature and humidity on virus spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty in the impact of meteorological factors on epidemic trends","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Retrospective observational studies associating weather variables with the spread of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Heterogeneity in weather conditions beyond temperature and humidity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Heterogeneity in data collection dates and locations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible inclusion of biased studies in the search results.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of study outcomes due to varying levels of evidence.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to address potential conflicts and bias during study selection and evaluation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Systematic review on the emergence and replicability of the virus and its association with weather factors","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited studies on the influence of climate parameters on the spread of sars-cov-2","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Divergence in literature about the effects of temperature and humidity on the viability and transmissibility of the coronavirus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High transmissibility of sars-cov-2","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear routes of virus transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of population density and migratory flow on transmission","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Retailers not using digital signs to present covid information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Retailers not demonstrating corporate social responsibility through signage","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of communication with retailers about posted signs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited supply of professional signs due to demand and production capacity","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of follow-up research with customers to assess subjective properties of signs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited data collection due to covid-19 restrictions","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for rapid communication during crises","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Operational changes for retailers to operate under social distancing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variation in regulations between geographic locations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of readily available covid-19 content and necessary software code for digital signs","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Repurposing equipment as a coping mechanism for retailers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of alternative contact methods for customers at closed retailers","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate crisis management planning for small retailers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective use of digital signs by multi-location retailers during pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Informal signs conveying regret, gratitude, and well-wishes may lead to increased foot traffic and close interactions, posing a risk of contagious disease spread.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Informal signs conveying facts about expected behavior may not encourage compliance with public health guidelines, increasing the risk of contagious disease spread.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Introduction of non-local retail brands and their signage may not align with the neighborhood’s nature, potentially impacting the sense of community and local identity.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of informal signs alongside professional signs may lead to confusion and inconsistent messaging regarding social distancing measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Continued presence of informal signs may signal a lack of standardized health and safety measures, potentially undermining public confidence in the effectiveness of the retail environment’s disease mitigation efforts.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The coexistence of informal and professional signs may create confusion and uncertainty for individuals navigating retail environments, leading to potential violations of social distancing guidelines.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of small and sans-serif fonts on informal signs","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited color options due to cost and availability of printers","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"}]}
